about_the_game:
The demo gives you a glimpse of the intense combat that awaits.
Prepare to test your skills with a single weapon at your disposal. While the demo won't let you collect coins and power up your character yet, the full game offers a deep upgrade system. Earn coins by defeating foes, then unleash a torrent of upgrades to transform yourself into an unstoppable force!

name: Survival Of Exon Demo
short_description: In the face of oblivion, fight for your future in Survival of Exon, a 2D pixel art roguelite demo. Defeat hordes of enemies and acquire coins. Buy strategic upgrades, transforming yourself into a relentless force. This is just a taste of what awaits in the full version of Survival of Exon.
supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
